description: This file defines a mock class ServiceMock implementing the interface WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell. It is used for unit testing components that depend on IShell, providing mocked method responses.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface for unit testing.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string for the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix URL or path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature or capability is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a message.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if service runs in background.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path for proxy stub.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Retrieves the reason for a state change.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the start mode of the service.
